LM RNN¶

fastai.fastai.lm_rnn.RNN_Encoder(ntoken, …) A custom RNN encoder network that uses - an embedding matrix to encode input, - a stack of LSTM layers to drive the network, and - variational dropouts in the embedding and LSTM layers
fastai.fastai.lm_rnn.MultiBatchRNN(bptt, …) .
fastai.fastai.lm_rnn.LinearDecoder(n_out, …) .
fastai.fastai.lm_rnn.LinearBlock(ni, nf, drop) .
fastai.fastai.lm_rnn.PoolingLinearClassifier(…) .
fastai.fastai.lm_rnn.SequentialRNN(*args) .
